mapper.select: select app_no, MEM_NAME, mem_id, GENDER, MEM_PHONE, APP_DETAIL, c_no,c_name from (select rn, app_no, MEM_NAME, mem_id, GENDER, MEM_PHONE, APP_DETAIL, c_no,c_name from (SELECT rownum rn, A.APP_NO app_no, A.MEM_NAME, A.MEM_ID mem_id, A.GENDER, A.MEM_PHONE, A.APP_DETAIL, A.C_NO c_no, C.C_NAME c_name FROM APPLYAPP a join club c on (a.c_no = c.c_no) WHERE A.C_NO = #{c_no}) where rownum <=#{endNo}) where rn >=#{startNo}
select c_no, major_no, sub_no, mem_id,c_name,c_loc,c_place,c_date,c_time,c_price,c_count,c_image, c_detail,c_hits from club where mem_id = #{mem_id}
select c.c_no, c.mem_id, major_no, sub_no, c_name,c_loc,c_place,c_date,c_time,c_price,c_count,c_image, c_detail,c_hits from wish w join club c on(w.c_no=c.c_no) where w.mem_id = #{mem_id}
